info.name: Fark.com - (6-1-2011) Cleaned up / Dark
info.description: DISCONTINUED Minimal dark gray style for Fark.com Best results: 'Disable headline color hover effect' in the myFark preferences.
info.additionalInfo:
[xxxxxxxxxx] Discontinued - Go nuts.
[08-07-2013] Hid iframeContainers

[12-23-2012] Hid pleabar for ads. Fixed Username and Log out links
[04-17-2012] Styled Preferences headers, Comment text box now has a dark background color
[01-30-2012] Fixed post headers; Update:The way Fark has changed their html, in order to show favorites color borders, non-favorited users will have to have a white border, removed for now.
[12-26-2011] Added option to turn off voting options
[06-28-2011] Fixed error in #header
[06-22-2011] Fixed new white space that appeared
[06-18-2011] Removed new 'spacing' that popped up out of nowhere today
[06-18-2011] Fixed Bio Headers
[06-17-2011] Reduced brightness of comment headers (new comments screenshot)
[06-08-2011] Made 'Welcome [Name] | Log out' clickable
[06-08-2011] Added Row color option to the style. Yes, provides alternating colors for Story Headlines. No, provides a solid color.
[06-06-2011] Visited comment links are now brighter than unvisited links (assuming you aren't clearing your history)
[06-06-2011] Added some link styles, better link visibility in comments.
[06-04-2011] Added style to the Votes display (.chead) 
[06-03-2011] Changed .ctext to have a transparent background, but keep the 'favorites' color border.
[06-03-2011] Unified things a bit better.
[06-03-2011] Renamed from Quick and Dirty (6-1-2011 Changes)
